rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment quotes a statement of confidence (Q5), not an Alarmist cue (Q2).
The segment quotes a statement about elimination, not impact with scale.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment expresses confidence in future elimination ('we will be able to eliminate this'), not current safety/control.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment states a positive expectation ('will be able to eliminate'), not a bare negation.
Describes actions and a future outcome ('with good biosecurity, with good farmer participation, we will be able to eliminate this') without active reassurance for the audience.
